attributes.title: Worst app on the App Store
attributes.review: It took 10000000 hours to download and when I opened it it crashed my phone for one entire month.

attributes.title: THIS APP GAVE ME THE CORONA VIRUS😷😷
attributes.review: Now that all the Trumpets (Trump supporters) are here, are you really gonna vote for a racist and a rapist...Are you really gonna vote for a guy that’s in love with his daughter...Are you really that ignorant...Trump talks about making America great again when this country is being torn apart...I’ll be praying that Trump will be voted out, I’ll be praying that the Simpsons come true actually...I’ll be praying that all you Trumpets change how you perceive Donald Trump...I really REALLY can’t believe he’s getting rid of Tik Tok cuz we’re calling him out...That man deserves worse than Hell...Don’t download the app BTW...It literally crashed my iPad and it started sending me death threats...It gave me chlamydia and it made me schizophrenic, and because of that I killed my pregnant cat...But since I still had the app installed, my cat came back from the dead and reincarnated my boyfriend and he tried to rape me...While he was trying to get my clothes off he was saying that Donald Trump was telling him to do it...I managed to hit him with my Elsa vibrator and escaped...Unfortunately, he stabbed me in the leg with a knife while I was trying to escape...I am tying for the hospital. You now understand why this app is dangerous and why Donald Trump needs to be stopped...We make America great again by voting Trump out!! Trump 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸On a grave stone😻💖😘

attributes.title: Trumps an ass
attributes.review: I’m chilling with my dog scrolling through the app and the dog turns into a orange then I go to sell the phone cuz I cand deal with the fact that the app was on my phone so then I go to eat ice cream soi open the freezer and WHO THE HELL PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREZER so then I get on my phone and get on TikTok oh wait it will be banned tomorrow so I stay on for an hour or 2 to say goodbye then I smell Cheetos from the other room so I go in there and I see Cheetos in there so crush them and make cheese soup😋😋😋

attributes.title: GROSS🤢
attributes.review: i downloaded the app in high hopes that it would give me information on the 2020 election, but instead the FIRST the i saw was donald trumps ugly orange dusty crusty cheeto ass. not happy

attributes.title: Poop app
attributes.review: This app is super poop. It crashed my phone and deleted my homework files. I needed those files for my research. Please don’t get this app it’s awful and needs to be taken down

attributes.title: Ratatouille
attributes.review: So the first problem I had with this app is that it took 369,000 days to load and download. I first downloaded this app or tried to download this app 10 days after I was born on 420 BC and to my surprise it didn’t download into -69 days ago. SHREK-my second problem my head was when I first open the app I started hearing noises of trump talking in my ear whispering baby boo-boo baby boo-boo. Enter sign up it asked for my number so I gave it my number so I could sign up and not 69 seconds later I started getting spam messages from Trump himself. And they were✨creepy✨ so then I tried deleting the app but none of it stopped the whispering continued and the texts continued and not only after I deleted the app did everything continue but I got 420 viruses on my phone from Trump himself saying that I automatically have to poop my pants in his mouth or else I will be executed. But anyway Bob Ross is pretty cool right;)👁👅👁
